arts.ttl: Wolves reach fourth round with win at Bristol City
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Premier League Wolverhampton Wanderers ease into the fourth round of the FA Cup with a clinical win at Championship side Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Man Utd Eyeing 'Cut-Price' Move for Matheus Cunha
arts.sum: Exclusive: Man Utd, Arsenal and Tottenham are eyeing a cut-price deal for Wolves star Matheus Cunha in the summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Wolves avoid Bristol City scare to progress to FA Cup round four
arts.sum: Wolves avoided an FA Cup upset by beating Bristol City 2-1 at Ashton Gate to reach the fourth round of the competition.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Wolves as Robins exit FA Cup despite Scott Twine cracker
arts.sum: Found it incredibly tough in the opening exchanges as Wolves repeatedly got the better of him down the left flank and while he remained slightly shaky, he did a lot of good things down his side. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Wolves reach fourth round with win at Bristol City
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Premier League Wolverhampton Wanderers ease into the fourth round of the FA Cup with a clinical win at Championship side Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Early goals from Aït-Nouri and Rodrigo Gomes edge Wolves past Bristol City
arts.sum: Wolves doubters were out in full force in the buildup to their FA Cup third round tie at Bristol City with many backing the hosts to keep their recent history of upsets going. . However, the critics were silenced as the visitors displayed top-flight class in a much-improved display at Ashton Gate. Vítor Pereira was predicted to make a raft of changes but the manager settled on three from the club’s 3-0 Premier League loss to Nottingham Forest, with the goalkeeper Sam Johnstone, André and the new signing Emmanuel Agbadou coming into the starting lineup. The 27-year-old defender Abagdou had a good debut after joining from Reims on a four-and-a-half-year deal on Thursday. He was calm and assured on the ball, won free-kicks and confidently marshalled the back line. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Rayan Ait-Nouri scores as Wolves avoid FA Cup shock by beating Bristol City
arts.sum: First-half goals from Ait-Nouri and Rodrigo Gomes proved decisive for the Premier League visitors.

arts.ttl: Wolves make forward their ‘priority’ – Following him ‘very closely’, feel transfer could happen quickly
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers have made Toulouse forward Zakaria Aboukhlal their ‘priority’ this month as they continue to strengthen their squad. That’s according to Foot Mercato, who report that Aboukhlal ‘could quickly move’ this month after impressing in France. arts.ttl: Wolves target move for Toulouse’s Zakaria Aboukhlal
arts.sum: According to a report from Foot Mercato, Wolverhampton Wanderers want to sign Toulouse FC’s Zakaria Aboukhlal (24) this winter. The Premier League side sit just above the relegation zone and…

arts.ttl: Bristol City vs. Wolves: Defender makes debut for Premier League side in FA Cup tie
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers announce their starting lineup for Saturday's FA Cup third-round tie at Bristol City.
